column4: should a firewall (more specifically Shorewall) affect the speed of the connection? If not, then I'm having troubles with Shorewall as I can't seem to ping the server though I can connect to its services like SSH and HTTP.
some firewalls block pings, which is good
Bilange: fair enough but with the firewall enabled it seems to slow everything down
It could be, though the firewall doesn't do too much, as far as I know
